creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Miroslava, 10, waiting for the departure of the evacuation train in Pokrovsk, Donetsk region. Today, she and his family were evacuated from their home in Chasiv Yar. As Russian troops advancing in Bakhmut area, this city becomes dangerous to stay in, as frequent rusisan shelling can ruin civillian houses, wound or even kill them anytime.
